search_results.title: Kevin Claxton - Biography
search_results.snippet: Kevin Claxton is known for Never Let Go (2015) and Right Here, Right Now (2023). He has been married to Julie Claxton since January 3, 1958.

search_results.title: SGG #64: Coach Kevin Claxton: “I genuinely love the game”
search_results.snippet: Kevin Claxton played football at the University of Wisconsin from 2007-2011, where he was a four-year letter winner as a standout linebacker.
